Призовите мегалотрагуса — травоядное животное с рогами, напоминающими скимитар.<tab>Предпочитая более холодный климат, это внушительное травоядное животоное, родом из северных гор Абалатии, покинуло свое первоначальное место обитания и переселилось на Коэртас, который замерз после Катаклизма. Это примитивный вид, который практически не изменился с течением времени, а некоторые из них, как известно, даже способны использовать магию.<tab>Если правильно прищуриться, кажется, что у него есть уши! Или это рога...? — Нашу Мхакаракка

Призовите вашего дракона света — существо, которое можно призвать только с помощью волшебного свистка, пропитанного эфиром героев.<tab>Это светоносное существо отвечает на звук рога, наделённого силой древнего героя. Говорят, что когда-то этот дракон был верным спутником героя, победившего зло после великого приключения в другом мире, но только лишь сам свет хранит правду об этом.<tab>Такое сияние... такое великолепие... — Странствующий менестрель

Призовите кресло-Джибаньян. Таинственный предмет мебели, созданный по образу и подобию йо-кая по имени Джибаньян.<tab>Несмотря на то, что эта таинственная вещь создана по образу йо-кая живущего на земле, это кресло способно летать! Говорят, что оно настолько удобно, что превращает и людей, и йо-каев в никчёмных бездельников.<tab>Присажи-нья-вайтесь! — Сейгецу Просветлённый

Call into battle your magitek hyperconveyor, a modern-day improvement on ancient Allagan logistics.<tab>Guided as ever by the ethos of constant advancement, imperial magitek engineers returned to improve their conveyor system, simplifying its assembly and trimming weight by 8%. The result is enhanced fuel efficiency, demonstrating that even world-conquering empires can be environmentally minded.<tab>Hah! Success! - Aulus mal Asina

Призовите Элл Тоу — молодую драконицу, которая питает страсть к человеческим ремёслам.<tab>Впервые встреченная как любопытная драконица, Элл Тоу стала драконом, выращенным за время пребывания в Ишгарде. Благодаря своей страсти к ремёслам она претерпела невиданную доселе эволюцию, развив ловкие передние конечности, позволяющие ей ловко управляться со всевозможными инструментами ремесла.<tab>У тебя есть талант к этому, Элл Тоу! — Hautdilong

Summon forth Incitatus, an enchanted steed favored of the merchant Rowena. If it could talk, it would doubtless drive a hard bargain.<tab>Under the patronage of its mistress, Rowena, this enchanted steed has led a pampered life. Able to comprehend language, it was often seen attending Khloe Aliapoh's storytelling sessions, her tales of high adventure inspiring it to set out on one of its own.<tab>Your loyal steed awaits! - Voyce

Summon forth a behatted and begloved embodiment of festive cheer.<tab>Scholars maintain that the tradition of building snowmen originated in Gyr Abania, where they were used to encourage blessings such as “cold” and “snow.” Considering that the region is almost entirely covered in arid desert, how the snowmen were built in the first place remains a mystery.<tab>Two words: stupendous snowman... - Adventurer Who Shall Remain Unnamed

Summon forth the Lunar Whale, which is definitely not an actual whale, but certainly large enough to warrant the name. Seats up to eight people, including the pilot.<tab>Produced by Garlond Ironworks based on mysterious tales from a distant land, it not only resembles a whale on the outside, but shares its voluminous belly. With enough room for the pilot and seven passengers, it stands─or rather, floats─in a class of its own.<tab>She is risen! The promised Ship of Light─the Lunar Whale! - A Man Known Simply as “Elder”

Summon forth Eden, or rather, a considerably smaller version of the gargantuan entity.<tab>The existence of this miniaturized replica can be attributed─as with many, many other things─to a combination of aether and crystal, a fragment of which was discovered inside Eden itself. The result was this smaller likeness, which may be summoned at will and is <var 1A 02 /var>probably<var 1A 01 /var> less likely to trigger an apocalyptic catastrophe. <tab>Eden...the first sin eater. - Gaia

Summon forth your Cerberus mount. Be warned, however, that riding into a peaceful village on the back of a gigantic, slavering, three-headed hellhound may cause quite a stir among the locals.<tab>In addition to its immense strength and three gaping maws lined with razor-sharp fangs, this voidsent boasts incredible longevity, having lived since the Third Astral Era. The collars, of Allagan design, are believed to make it as tame as a puppy, though it may simply be biding its time before devouring its keeper.<tab>What a nice little doggy! - Nashu Mhakaracca

Призовите вашу большую ракушку — огромного ракообразного, которое с радостью перевезёт вас. По иронии судьбы он довольно мал, хотя всё же для краба довольно большой.<tab>Выращенный кулинарным знатоком Кикирном, этот беззаботный ракообразный завязал дружбу со своим хозяином и тем самым избежал кастрюли. Хотя это не самый очевидный выбор для крепления, его гладкий, круглый панцирь всё же один из самых удобных.<tab>Большие ракушки названы так из-за величины их ракушек, которые являются наиболее крупными. Умно, да? — Кикирн Натуралист

Summon forth Arion, the heavenly steed of unmatched swiftness.<tab>Legends speak of a majestic and unwaveringly loyal horse who would never fail to deliver its master from peril. Such myths were founded in fact, as the divine steed has descended from the heavens to seek one possessed of a true and virtuous heart, with whom it may right the wrongs of the world.<tab>The speed of the horse is a grace unmatched! - Uma Bugyo

Призовите вашего изумрудного дракона — магическое существо, появившееся, когда зазвучал рог, пропитанный силой неизвестного первобытного существа.<tab>Этот дракон, похоже, является плодом магии неизвестного первобытного существа, которого поглотило Изумрудное Оружие. Видит ли он через светящуюся сферу на передней части морды или каким-то другим способом, неясно. Его зелёный панцирь имеет обтекаемую форму.<tab>Рубины! Изумруды! Сапфиры! О, как они сверкают! — Uin Nee

Summon forth a prototype roader, one of the fastest ways to reach your destination while scaring the seven hells out of everyone on the way.<tab>Salvaged from the battlegrounds of Gyr Abania and restored by goblins, this devilishly speedy─yet decidedly unwieldy─contraption is said to have a mind of its own. In this case, however, that turn of phrase may have a ring of truth to it...<tab>Gobbieflock does not go looking for trouble! Trouble comes looking for gobbieflock! ...Honest! - Slowfix Cointoss

Summon forth a chocorpokkur, which is... Well, perhaps you had best see it for yourself.<tab>This bizarre creature is the result of an enormous korpokkur coming into contact with vast amounts of chocolate. It has since taken to journeying far and wide to deliver sweet treats to anyone who does not immediately flee at the sight of it.<tab>This ambrosial aroma. This couldn't possibly be...chocolate!? - Carvallain de Gorgagne

Summon forth your Gabriel Mark III mount, though you may find this transforming warmachina is less than meets the eye. Claims that its gold paint deflects laser beams are entirely unfounded.<tab>As any experienced adventurer knows, if a previously bested enemy appears again with a new color scheme, it will pose a significantly greater threat than before, or at least, take longer to kill. Luckily, this miniature prototype is on your side, or so you hope.<tab>Such a beautiful golden color! - Ihase

Призовите антилопу лань — проворное травоядное животное, шерсть которого имеет голубоватый оттенок, характерный для самок.<tab>Эти травоядные животные, обитающие в основном в степях, часто встречались и в горах Коэртаса, пока регион не покрыло снегом в результате Катаклизма. Многочисленные попытки одомашнить их ради мяса и молока оказались безуспешными из-за их свирепого характера.<tab>Еще один день на охоте, и ничего, кроме мяса антилопы, добыть не удалось. — Isarmoi

Призовите антилопу оленя — проворное травоядное животное с острыми рогами, характерными для самцов.<tab>Быстрые и уверенные в себе антилопы издревле служили любимым средством передвижения для племён Абалатийского хребта. В последние годы древняя магия позволила этим существам летать, если у всадника есть достаточный запас эфира.<tab>Стадо молодых антилоп сошло с ума. — Максимилье

Summon forth Landerwaffe, magnificent mechanical dragon of legend, and be the envy of all the other kids.<tab>Armed literally to the wings, this mechanical dragon is believed to have been created by the Allagan Empire to combat the creatures whose form it mimics. Magnificent and proud, it allows none upon its back save one whom it deems a true hero.<tab>Wow, you're swifter than a salamander! - Pixie Flowerkeep

Summon forth Al-iklil, a stylish hovering craft designed to carry up to two riders. Any more and it may not heed you.<tab>A gift from Fran to the Bozjan Resistance, this craft hovers by the power of skystones, crystals that allow entire masses of land to levitate. Its name is said to be derived from an ancient Ivalician word meaning “crown.”<tab>I'm only here to see how the story unfolds. Any self-respecting leading man would do the same. - Debonair Sky Pirate

Summon forth your Cruise Chaser to cruise along in style as you give chase to your foes.<tab>Created by the genius minds of the Illuminati, this warmachina is capable of assuming bipedal and airship forms to adapt to the changing conditions of battle. Smitten by its design, it is said that a certain warmachina fanatic has a mind to produce a miniature version.<tab>The chase is on! - Seserukka

Summon forth your Construct VI-S. Painted red so it goes faster. Theoretically.<tab>This flashy golem was constructed by a band of commerce-minded kobolds hoping to establish regular trade with their seafaring neighbors. Coated in Lominsan red, propulsion power is apparently enhanced by as much as thirty percent.<tab>No one'll tell me what the bloody “S” stands for... - Lieutenant Skaetswys

Призовите вашего алмазного дракона — волшебное существо, которое появилось, когда зазвучал рог, пропитанный силой неизвестного первобытного существа.<tab>Этот дракон, по-видимому, является плодом магии неизвестного первобытного существа, поглощённого Алмазным оружием. Оно облаченно в пластины, отвечает на призыв рога, пропитанного силой неизвестного первобытного существа, призыватель которого, как полагают, был членом сопротивления Корвоси.<tab>Каждый здесь упирается в алмазный слиток! — Глагг

Summon forth your polar bear, a gentle giant with a soft spot for sweets.<tab>In search of ice to make frozen treats, the confectioner Nekeke traveled to an isle in the northern seas, where she encountered this hulking creature. A bite of her sweets was all it took for it to follow her back to Eorzea, where it subsequently grew fond of you.<tab>You're never too big for sweets. - Ancient Saying

Summon forth your squad of gilded Namazu to bear you upon a gilded mikoshi─all of which is as gaudy as it sounds.<tab>In order to secure enough coin to fund their seven-year festival, the Namazu sought the counsel of Rowena, who spoke thus: if you want to make great profit, sell wares of great worth. And what could be worth more than a gilded mikoshi borne by eight gilded Namazu?<tab>Wasshoi! Wasshoi! What am I doing? I do not know! I do not care! Whee! - Namazu Spectator

Summon forth the Resplendent Vessel of Ronka. Just like the Great Vessel of Ronka, but really shiny.<tab>After being stolen from ancient Ronkan ruins, this mystical urn passed through many an illicit hand before coming to be in yours. Blowing into the flute found within caused it to thus burgeon with the divine and take on a golden glow─an auspicious sign if ever there was one.<tab>The great serpent...it speaks! - Chaqurl Qhotl

Summon forth your magicked card to take you wonder by wonder, over, sideways, and under.<tab>Crafted by Eorzea's foremost goldsmith, Godbert Manderville, this enchanted card is awarded to those who have collected an unprecedented number of Triple Triad cards. May it bear you through endless diamond skies, to dazzling places you never knew, and show you new fantastic points of view.<tab>Fancy a game of cards? - Iola

Призовите вашу островную мандрагору — главный островной продукт.<tab>Рождённая во влиятельной семье в Империи Западной Мандры, сказочной нации овощей, эта мандрагора выросла до невероятных размеров благодаря плодородной почве и обилию солнечного света. Увы, его благословенное воспитание можно считать и проклятием, ибо судьба таких первоклассных продуктов — прямиком на рынок.<tab>Я буду очень признателен, если если вы избавите поле от некоторой мандрагоры. — Гуркант

Призовите вашего островного лукового принца — овоща, чей колоссальный размер соответствует его положению.<tab>Король среди мандрагор, этот выращенный на острове Луковый принц знал все удобства. Однако такая изнеженная жизнь привела к скуке, и он стал коротать дни за шалостями. Раздосадованный поведением сына, король отправил его в оруженосцы к известному герою, чтобы тот научился ответственности и лидерству.<tab>Лук, в своих бреднях я позабыл, зачем позвал тебя! — Блоезенг

Призовите вашего островного баклажанного рыцаря — огромного овоща, самого воплощения рыцарства.<tab>Выходец из тех же земель, что и Помидорный король. Они находились в одном ящике с государем, однако он выпал за борт, когда судно столкнулось с бурным морем, и несколько дней дрейфовал, прежде чем его выбросило на необитаемый остров. Среди прочих подвигов, он гордится тем, что сыграл ключевую роль в основании империи Западной Мандры.<tab>А я думал что ты дикая репа, убийственный баклажан, или что-то вроде того! — Крошечный торговец

Summon forth your island Garlic Jester, a mandragora as pungent as it is humorous.<tab>Possessed of a humorous wit, this mandragora encountered the island Tomato King when they were both adrift. During that time, he amused his sovereign with dozens of droll tales, and in recognition for his services, he was appointed the court jester after the founding of the West Mandra Empire.<tab>For one with a name more befitting a jester, you fight with the savagery of a rabid demon. - Moglin

Summon forth your island Tomato King, a sovereign who rules with a strong and juicy─er, just hand.<tab>Grown in sunny Vylbrand, this king among produce was being shipped to distant lands when his crate was cast overboard in rough seas. He eventually arrived at a desert island, where he triumphed in a war with avaricious avians and won the heart of a local princess, together with whom he established the West Mandra Empire.<tab>I dunno about you, but I ain't so keen on the notion of callin' a bloody tomato <var 1A 02 /var>Yer Grace<var 1A 01 /var>. - Tiny Trader

Summon forth your island Mandragora Queen, a well-cultivated vegetable fit for a king.<tab>The life of this island-grown princess was forever changed when she met her future husband the island Tomato King, whom the tides had borne to her. Overcoming their difference in origin, they wed and unified the island's vegetables under the banner of the West Mandra Empire.<tab>I fear a diet comprised entirely of one type of root vegetable will not hold up to scrutiny... - Hinageshi

Summon forth your lynx of eternal darkness, which could be what a certain eldest of all primals might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards the astral. Its shadowed wings call to mind the valiance of Zodiark, eldest and mightiest of primals, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in eternal Darkness.<tab>Who are you, the Warrior of bleedin' Darkness!? - Gallant Guardsman

Summon forth your lynx of divine light, which could be what a certain will of the star might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards the umbral. Its radiant wings call to mind the majesty of Hydaelyn, the will and protector of the star, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in divine Light.<tab>So bold, so majestic─ just like a Warrior of Light! - Humphrey

Позовите Аргоса — верного фамильяра Венат, чтобы он сопроводил вас до нужного места, пока вы будете любоваться мягкостью его золотистой шерсти.<tab>Этот похожий на собаку питомец, созданный Венат, предлагает свою спину только тем, кого считает достойным своей благосклонности, что и произошло с вами после первой встречи с ним в Море Скорби.<tab>Боже, какой же он шустрый пёсик! — Нашу Мхакаракка

Summon forth your dreadnaught, a hulking machina that's equally at home on the battlefield as it is at construction sites.<tab>Originally used as a weapon, this Allagan machina was eventually superseded by newer models and repurposed for construction. Legends tell of a young man who took one such unit on a rampage, wreaking havoc through enemy ranks.<tab>What does it do? - Inquisitive Young Man

Summon forth Demi-Phoinix. Because four wings are better than two and three heads better than one.<tab>This entity is a recreation of the being found imprisoned inside Pandæmonium. The original was the fruit of the ancients' research into immortal birds, but owing to its volatility, it was branded a failure.<tab>How do you spell that again? - An Ancient

Summon forth Calydontis. He's wild but he's yours.<tab>Once a dreaded presence in its forest domain, this lord among wild boars met its match in a band of dauntless adventurers. Having thus learned to bow before the strong, it found a master in you.<tab>When I'm skilled enough to fell a wild boar on my own, I'll allow myself to indulge... - Isarmoix

Summon forth Victor, a dog to rule over all dogs─at dog shows, that is.<tab>Lauded by no less a personage than Emperor Varis, Victor is a perennial champion at Garlean dog shows. Being bred and trained for competition, it isn't suited to combat, though it may at least intimidate foes with its fearsome mien.<tab>Hmph, all bark an' no bite! - Rabid Wives Houndkeep

Summon forth your level checker, a mysterious machine that can determine your strength...and apparently also shrink and carry you inside it.<tab>When this mysterious machine first determined your strength, the result was “level 90.” By what method it came up with its figure, and whether it is even accurate, none can possibly say.<tab>You've really taken it to another level with this! - Kai-Shirr

Summon forth Papa Paissa. It's for a good cause.<tab>This exceptionally large paissa has sired no less than eight offspring, and in order to earn the coin to rear them, it chose to work as an adventurer's mount. By taking it into your service, you are supporting its adorable brood.<tab>I can only imagine the burden they bear with so many mouths to feed. - Pip

Summon forth your wivre, a mighty horned beast said to be nature's battering ram.<tab>Native to the New World, these ill-mannered scalekin are notoriously difficult to tame. Yet where others have failed, the Mamool Ja have succeeded, their people employing wivres as beasts of burden and weapons of war both.<tab>I pray that you at least consider a watchful trot into danger rather than a headlong charge... - Iliud

Summon forth your porxie king. Smells like bacon that's a cut above the rest─though that might just be an effect of the crown.<tab>Unlike its kin, this porxie was born without the ability to cure the tempered. Rather than have it go to waste, however, it was made into a mount and given a crown─perhaps to evoke a sense of luxury and comfort.<tab>This specimen can be considered royalty among them. - Martineau

Призовите ваш Гарлонд GL-II. Для тех, кто знает толк в хороших местах, и кто никогда не желал притворяться кем-то другим.<tab>Это прототип магитех-мобиля был разработан «Шестерёнками Гарлонда», чтобы стать средством передвижения новой эры. Компактный, но мощный церулеумный двухбаночный двигатель обеспечивает лёгкое ускорение, что в сочетании с прочным шасси позволяет ему преодолевать такую пересеченную местность, какую можно встретить на необитаемых островах.<tab>Новейшие технологии! Революционные идеи! — Разель Хуэйцзан Станционный

Summon forth your mechanical lotus, a flower-shaped mode of transport with a spiritual aura.<tab>Fashioned by the enigmatic Onishishu, this mechanical conveyance assumes the form of the lotus flower, a symbol of purity and sanctity in the Far East. Indeed, it gives off a distinctly spiritual aura, though how it does so is a jealously guarded secret.<tab>Their purity is...astounding. - Rammbroes

Summon forth Fylgja, a dragon with a soft spot for heroes and songs.<tab>Like her noble forebear Ratatoskr, Fylgja is passing fond of mankind, and traveled the world in search of mortals worthy of immortalizing in song. During the course of her journeys, she would encounter a soul who shone most brilliantly in battle. So moved was she by the hero's selfless valor, she chose to become <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> follower.<tab>Would you look at that─ my dulcet voice has drawn yet another devoted follower! - Ulala

Summon forth your alkonost, an imposing antlered avian native to northern Ilsabard.<tab>Captured in the Bozjan wilderness, this creature was passed around as a curiosity before eventually being released again. From the start, it seemed unperturbed in the presence of men, leading some to believe it was trained by an imperial beastmaster.<tab>How goes the training for your avian mount? - Luquelot

Summon forth your island buffalo. Tough on the outside but tender on the inside.<tab>Belonging to a species introduced by pirates as livestock, this mild-mannered beast took to living on your island one day. Though it appears to have reverted to being feral, it is easily won over with food, in gratitude for which it happily bears you upon its back.<tab>It's one thing to see the buffaloes in a tizzy, but another to think they could have anything to do with the quakes. - P'ebaloh

Призовите вашего бота 602 — белую единицу поддержки, обнаруженную в механических руинах.<tab>Эта миниатюрная белая машина, восстановленная из руин машинных форм жизни, была создана для того, чтобы обеспечить подразделениям YoRHa поддержку при передвижении. Она может переносить одного человека... пусть и не совсем стильно и с комфортом.<tab>Те, кто готов бороться, никогда не будут нуждаться в транспорте! — Флаер Великой Компании

Призовите лунного прыгуна. Он гарантированно вселит чувство благополучия в каждого, кто окажется в поле зрения.<tab>Эта улучшенная версия помошника была с любовью создана компанией лопорритов-изобретателей. Лопориты не только сделали его пригодным для езды, но также оснастили компактным динамиком, который может воспроизводить звуки Dreamingway, для поднятия настроения.<tab>Ну что ж, давайте приступим! — Dreamingway

Summon forth your island alligator. Demands to be seen not later, but always.<tab>Hailing from unknown shores, this alligator appeared on your island one day and made itself at home. It takes pride in the fact that its kind is rare out at sea, and willingly carries a rider upon its back if only so it can parade itself in front of all and sundry.<tab>A face you could kiss─if it weren't covered in scales, that is! - Foerzagyl

Призовите повозку с бегемотом — двухколёсное транспортное средство, изобретённое молодым Аркасодарасом.<tab>Взяв за основу дизайн повозки с чокобо, группа молодых людей из Аркасодары изобрела эту двухколёсную повозку, запряжённую бегемотом. Ткань для навеса от солнца создана с использованием техник, применяемых при изготовлении ковров-самолётов Корвоси, и наделяет повозку и бегемота способностью парить в небесах.<tab>Повозка с бегемотом может обогнать почти любого в этих джунглях. — Trna

Summon forth your troll mount, a gentle giant native to the northern seas.<tab>Contrary to their savage appearance, trolls are highly intelligent creatures. Sharlayan scholars once sought to teach them sign language, and on account of this specimen's friendly nature, it is believed that it was a subject in that experiment.<tab>If I didn't know better, I could've sworn that troll was talking to you... - Roegadyn Gleaner

Призовите ваш НЛО и испытайте все ощущения от похищения инопланетянами.<tab>Хотя внешне эта копия идентична звездолёту ПуПу, в ней отсутствуют некоторые функции, такие как дублирование материи, что, в свете последних событий, возможно, и к лучшему. Кроме того, она не может уменьшить вас с помощью антигравитационного луча до размеров, позволяющих поместиться в её кабине, а значит вы просто будете болтаться в ее тяговом луче.<tab>В редакцию «Правды» поступает большое количество сообщений от читателей, утверждающих, что они наблюдали неопознанные летающие объекты. — Delion

Призовите вашего винегаруна — плотоядного чешуйчатого зверя с челюстью, похожей на клешню.<tab>Хотя драконы обычно используют винегарунов в качестве слуг, людям с трудом удаётся приручить этих существ. Однако в последние годы у виноградарей появился успешный метод дрессировки, позволяющий использовать их как средство передвижения или для доставки грузов.<tab>Эти винегаруны всегда гоняются за нами, муглами, щелкают своими клинковыми челюстями и размахивают клинковыми хвостами. — Нетерпеливый Мугл

Summon forth your Orthos craklaw. May or may not have participated in famous battles which actually took place in history.<tab>Discovered in Eureka Orthos, this specimen of craklaw was imbued with magic in a bid to further harden its carapace. Though that experiment ended in failure, by way of a peculiar side effect, it has attained the power of flight.<tab>What you after? Fish? Crab? - Eybor

Summon forth your bluefeather lynx mount, which could be what a certain feathered familiar might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation composed of the esoteric power of dynamis. It is believed that the Endsinger brought forth this mysterious entity, but for what purpose is unclear. Could it be a tribute, perhaps, bestowed upon one who has overcome her aria of despair?<tab>The light of hope shall ever guide our steps so long as we have the will to press onward. - Edmont de Fortemps

Summon forth your megashiba mount─fluffy, living proof that massive can still be adorable.<tab>Sold as a “mameshiba,” a nonexistent miniature Far Eastern dog, this creature continued to grow until it was larger than a man. But despite its prodigious size, it has somehow retained its cuteness, which it combines with the practicality of being ridable.<tab>He's so fluffy! - T'maritaa

Summon forth your traveling supporter. Proof that there is nothing a pair of bunny ears can't improve.<tab>This advanced bipedal machina was found wandering the Carteneau Flats by a quartermaster of the Eorzean Alliance. While it bears a striking resemblance to Allagan clockwork soldiers, it appears to have been enhanced by unknown hands (or paws).<tab>The supporter? I never would have suspected... It's supposed to help us farm carrots, not eat them! - Watchingway

Призовите Миу Миисва — существа, рождённого в Крайнем Пределе, которое всегда готово придти на помощь и подбодрить вас щупальцем.<tab>Рождённая на Элизионе из надежд Эа, эта своеобразная форма жизни динамис обладает полупрозрачным телом, напоминающим медузу, и может наносить своеобразные удары электричеством. Для него нет большего удовольствия, чем общаться с другими в микрокосме своего сердца. Буквально.<tab>Как и медузы, они прыгают, дёргаются и трясутся, пытаясь укачать себя. — Wawalago

Summon forth your wondrous lanner, a proud bird with a fondness for fantastical tales.<tab>Under the patronage of its mistress Rowena, this enchanted falcon has led a pampered life. Able to comprehend language, it loved nothing more than to listen to Khloe Aliapoh's tales, whose heroic protagonist it aspired to bear upon its back─in contest with another of Rowena's pets.<tab>I doubt even my falcons could keep pace with it. - Yugiri

Summon forth your magicked umbrella to whisk you off your feet in the most delightful way.<tab>This flying umbrella was created by a certain elderly mage in her youth. It uses a black umbrella as the base, the better for blending into the night and sneaking into the Great Gubal Library from above. Its creator, it would seem, has always had a rebellious streak.<tab>You can stand under my umbrella. - Kindly Maiden

Summon forth your magicked parasol, and have the whole world at your feet.<tab>This flying parasol was created by a certain elderly mage in her youth. Intending to sell them en masse to fund her research, she chose a pink parasol─popular in those days─as the base. Due to the need for considerable magical power and grip strength to use them, however, she experienced only modest success.<tab>Perhaps you'll need a parasol the next time you visit! - Sparkling-eyed Loporrit

Призовите вашего оленя Звёздного света, который, несмотря на его иллюзорность, может принести реальную радость всем и каждому.<tab>Северный олень Блитцен, прибывший из Шарлеана, подарил вам этот ездовой мираж в знак благодарности за вашу добрую помощь. От самого существа, до украшений — всё воссоздано с такой впечатляющей детализацией, что это можно считать настоящим чудом Звёздного света.<tab>Это чудо Звёздного света! — Налипонк

Призовите ваш трон Силь'ди. Когда-то на нём восседали правители Силь'ди, а теперь он служит вашим личным средством передвижения.<tab>Найденный в одном из секретных подземелий Силь'ди, этот великолепный трон, как полагают, был одним из запасных. Он движется по воле своего хозяина, но делает ли он это с помощью душ давно умерших Силь'ди или простой магии, неизвестно.<tab>Как вы могли принять меня за обогревателя трона?! — Моган

Призовите вашего Силки. Потому что чистота превыше миловидности.<tab>Это магическое существо, которое было найденно в глубинах подземелья Силь'ди, было создано бывшей Султаной Нанаши Уль Наши, которая создала его, чтобы королевский дворец стал чистым до скрипа. Вопреки внешнему виду, пом на хвосте, это и есть само существо, а не мышеподобная тварь.<tab>Я рассчитываю на вас, чтобы вы навели здесь порядок. — Блойдин

Summon forth your sunforged. Its searing flames consume all─with the exception of its owner, thankfully.<tab>A product of the genius mind of Hephaistos, this fiery phantom creation combines two concepts─a flying snake and an immortal bird─and can shapeshift as the situation demands. Only the individual it recognizes as its master may ride it unscathed.<tab>It tastes like burning... - Hapless Boy

Summon forth your lynx of imperious wind, which could be what a certain tempestuous archfiend might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards astral wind. Its blustery wings call to mind the caprice of Barbariccia, archfiend of wind, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in unrelenting storms.<tab>Motes against the tempest. In vain do they struggle... - Sonu Vanu

Summon forth the aeturna, an imposing feline that boasts far more than the standard nine lives.<tab>During an expedition to Ilsabard in his younger years, Emperor Xande is said to have come upon this fearsome beast. As its name, meaning “eternal,” would suggest, it possesses remarkable vitality, and in addition to serving as an armored warbeast, it was also a subject in the Allagans' research into immortality.<tab>Eternal life can be yours, ladies and gentlemen! - Silver-tongued Broker

Summon forth your set of ceruleum balloons. Propulsion not included.<tab>Filled with gasified ceruleum, this festive assortment of balloons boasts enough buoyancy to lift a full-grown Roegadyn off the ground. However, it possesses no means of propulsion, and one is required to provide one's own wind magicks to move.<tab>Squawk! Bring balloon directly over unbelievers' dung heap! - Ixali Chieftain

Призовите Эндена III — загадочное лиственное существо. У него есть рот, но оно не может говорить.<tab>В благодарность за вашу доброту пикси Эо Тир подарили вам это странное лиственное существо, которое они создали из листьев оригинального Эндена после его обрезки. Хотя оно и похоже на своего тёзку, оно лишено дара речи, и неизвестно, какие мысли скрываются за его постоянно озабоченным выражением лица.<tab>Мы, пикси, такие добрые, что решили превратить его в милый листочек! — Пикси, помешанная на овцах

Призовите <var 1A 02 /var>Блэкджек<var 1A 01 /var>, а точнее, его масштабный прототип. Куда именно вы отправитесь на нём — загадка, которую лучше оставить без ответа.<tab>По заказу председателя Татабару из «Воздушных перевозок Хайвинда» разработать новый дирижабль, инженеры Гарлонд Иронворкс изготовили этот масштабный прототип для испытаний. Несмотря на свои миниатюрные размеры, он обладает внушительной грузоподъёмностью и может легко перевезти вас и нескольких ваших друзей.<tab>Боже правый, это же <var 1A 02 /var>Блэкджек<var 1A 01 /var>! — Татараму

Summon forth fiery Phaethon, a legendary beast of Corvosi myth.<tab>According to Corvosi myth, simply being near this fiery steed is akin to bathing in hot coals, and it is only through the ingenuity of alchemy that one can ride it unscathed. A nigh-identical being, created to draw a carriage in the heavens, is said to have existed in the world unsundered, but it is uncertain what manner of connection, if any, exists between the two beasts.<tab>BURN! BURN! ALL IS BURN! - Gogmagolem

Summon forth Pinky, an elephantine machine engineered to enrapture.<tab>Upon hearing that inebriated folk are wont to have visions of a delightful pink elephant, the Loporrits were inspired to make the creature a reality. The tale was, of course, simply a joke at their expense, but if this machine brings a smile to even one person, then their efforts will not have been in vain.<tab>This pink color is perfect! - Auri Boy

Summon forth your lynx of righteous fire, which could be what a certain honor-bound archfiend might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards astral fire. Its fiery body calls to mind the ardor of Rubicante, archfiend of fire, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in impenetrable flames.<tab>It is time you were purified in the raging blaze of His blessing! - Zagozz Teh

Call into battle your magitek avenger G1, an imperial warmachina made gaudier by goblin hands.<tab>Rumor holds that a golden sasquatch statue stands at the heart of the Garlean capital, from which magitek weapons would emerge to defend the city should it fall under attack. The veracity of the tale aside, the goblins liked it enough that they decided to create this golden avenger to match the statue.<tab>I saw a golden opportunity just begging to be seized... - Tataru

Summon forth Chrysomallos, the golden ram of legend─though legend doesn't seem to say anything about illusory coins spilling forth endlessly...<tab>Instead of the white commonly seen in its kind, the fleece of this sheep is a remarkable golden hue. While the seller insisted that it is the golden ram of legend, as with all such claims, this should be taken with a pinch of salt. Only time and perhaps a new growth of wool will reveal the creature's true nature.<tab>To think sheep can thrive in so remote a place as this... - Cirina

Summon forth your Garlond GL-IS. Fitted with a sidecar to carry a trusty sidekick.<tab>A variant of the Garlond GL-I, this magitek vehicle is fitted with a sidecar to allow for two riders, with engine displacement increased to handle the additional weight. Comes with a life-size mascot lovingly crafted by Wedge─but strictly for a limited time only, and while stocks last!<tab>It's a Garlond through and through. - Cid

Summon forth your megaloambystoma. Or should that be <var 1A 02 /var>max<var 1A 01 /var>olotl? You decide.<tab>The fact that this impossibly large ambystoma is fitted with an elaborate saddle strongly suggests it was created to be ridden. However, its presence in Pandæmonium means it was flawed in some way and deemed a failure.<tab>It has been an age shhhince we have feashhhted on axolotl. - Seww

Призовите вашего Восходящего Феникса — бессмертную птицу полную благодарности к вам.<tab>Эта бессмертная птица из эорзейских легенд несёт в себе вечную благодарность вам — войнам Света. Считается, что после смерти она восстаёт из пепла, поэтому её почитают как символ возрождения.<tab>Огонь Ифрита и Феникса поселились в моем сердце, где они будут гореть вечно! — Джуд

Summon forth your burabura chochin, a kindred spirit in wandering.<tab>Contrary to expectation, this lantern ghost did not care to haunt people, and was content to simply wander Mount Rokkon. When it saw you similarly wandering, it took you for a kindred spirit and decided to follow you wherever the wind should blow.<tab>Could they be evil spirits, lying in wait for hapless treasure seekers? - Zukin

Summon forth Shishioji, a prince who just can't wait to be king (again).<tab>When the mighty Shishio, legendary auspice and king of the nue, was defeated, it shed a fragment of its malevolent will, which took form as this being. Possessing a will of its own, it recognizes you as its superior, and consents to bearing you upon its back.<tab>Doubtless the lion's share of the credit lies with me. - Nero tol Scaeva

Summon forth your shadow wolf, a nightmare creature that could only be dreamed up by the darkest of souls.<tab>A spawn of darkest shadow, this dread wolf is said to have been created by an evil king to do battle with a hero of eld. Though the truth of the tale cannot be verified, the creature's eyes betray not a hint of hatred towards the Warrior of Light, whom it serves with unfaltering obedience.<tab>When brought into the light, the wolf can seem less fearsome. - Pumpkin-headed Apparition

Summon forth your magicked children's bed, and enjoy the carefree sleep of a child wherever you go.<tab>Crafted especially for children, this magicked bed hovers by virtue of crystals sourced from floating isles, and gives the sensation of sleeping on a cloud. The design is said to be directly inspired by the beds used at Menphina's Arms.<tab>Keep that up and I'll send you to bed without supper. - Y'shtola

Summon forth your lynx of fallen shadow, which is what a certain knight in black might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation whose elemental aspect is tipped strongly towards Darkness. The motes of Light it sheds call to mind the grim resolve of one who bears a great burden, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in fallen shadow.<tab>I may deal from the shadows, but I dislike shadowy dealings. - Remon

Призовите Таргала — волка, готового следовать за своим хозяином хоть на край света.<tab>По словам странствующего менестреля, зверь, явившийся на помощь Клайву, был духом-проводником, рождённым из памяти его хозяина. Это существо так впечатлило проницательного музыканта, что он решил создать его верное подобие в надежде, что оно сможет стать вашим верным спутником.<tab>Незаменимый союзник, каких не сыскать. — Альфино

Summon forth your apocryphal Bahamut, an embodiment of the fallen wyrm's burning desire to be free...and apparently carry you on a sofa.<tab>This draconic entity is brought forth by blowing into the horn you received from the wandering minstrel while holding in your heart Bahamut's song recorded by the Heimdall. Thus imbued with hopes and dreams, it desires nothing more than to soar the boundless skies and recognizes your free-spirited self as its master.<tab>Let me examine it, that I might ascertain its authenticity. - Oboro

Summon forth your crescent moon mount. By all accounts more comfortable to perch upon than one shaped like a full moon.<tab>Designed in the likeness of a crescent moon, this magicked gondola was being kept in storage in Sharlayan, where it was classified as a gift. While its origin is undisclosed, the automaton that accompanies the contraption offers a telling clue.<tab>Gods, I can scarcely believe we went to the moon and back... - Thancred

Призовите Рийеса — механического носорога с яркой окраской, который никогда не отказывается терроризировать жителей Бландервилля.<tab>Этот механический носорог уже отправил за борт бесчисленное количество бобов. К счастью ваша модель была перепрограммирована, чтобы перевозить вас, а не отправлять в полёт своим рогом.<tab>Опять они уходят, уходят прежде чем мы успеем обсудить наш план действий! — Shigure

Summon forth your lynx of abyssal grief, which could be what a certain dread voidsent born in the depths of the moon might look like as a large, winged feline.<tab>A phantom creation whose being brims with the Darkness that roiled in the depths of the Thirteenth's moon. The motes of Light it sheds calls to mind the yearning for home that drove the dread voidsent Zeromus, but the origins of this familiar are shrouded in abyssal grief.<tab>I just...I just want to go home... - Drest

Summon forth your sabotender de la luna mount, a prodigious cactuar raised on a diet of rousing tales.<tab>Under the patronage of its mistress, Rowena, this cactuar has led a pampered life. With the merchant being too busy to personally tend to it, however, its care fell to Khloe Aliapoh, whose attentive hand and rousing tales allowed it to grow into a large specimen with a luminescent blossom.<tab>The smell of the sea is sending needles up my nose! - Presumptuous Postmoogle

Summon forth your spectral Statice, an avatar of the mischief-loving faerie from Aloalo Island.<tab>This mischief-loving faerie was originally companion to a scholar, but her aether refused to disperse in the wake of her master's death. After enduring a dull existence for long years, she found in you someone who could provide her with excitement, and thus did she weave an avatar of herself to join you on adventures.<tab>Most serious scholars consider it little more than a faerie tale. - Phillice

Summon forth your Garlond GL-IIT, a magitek vehicle equipped with a tiller, and cultivate your isle in style.<tab>A variant of the popular Garlond GL-II, this trike has been engineered for cultivating the land. The ceruleum-powered rotary tiller makes short work of transforming rough terrain, while the cargo tray is ideal for transporting materials and passengers both.<tab>This untamed isle is yours to cultivate as you see fit. - Tataru

Summon forth Peatie, a goobbue maiden with a soft spot for peach blossoms.<tab>Hailing from a place where the peach trees bloom, this winsome goobbue maiden was found and taken in by the traveling entertainer Aldemund. After delighting the crowds on Little Ladies' Day, she made the decision to join you on your adventures in order to spread more cheer.<tab>Place these peach blossoms in your hair, and become as princesses! - Aldiytha

Summon forth your quaqua, a familiar hailing from the south sea isles that has either a permanent snarl or grin, depending on one's outlook on life.<tab>Employed by a treasure hunter of Aloalo Island, this familiar was born of an early form of arcanima, an art which emerged in the south sea isles. The being's origin is attested by its predominantly wooden construction, a method which precedes the use of gemstones to create Carbuncles.<tab>Them younglin's will be grinnin' ear to ear when they see what you've got in store! - Baenfaeld

Призовите вашего островного пирифула — растительное существо, которое не имеет никакого отношения к некоему злобному гниющему овощу.<tab>Эта разновидность мандрагоры была на торговоом судне, и когда она должна была попасть в суп, она смогла сбежать и бросилась в океан, а затем по счастливой случайности прилив доставил ее на необитаемый остров. Тропический климат и плодородная почва острова позволили ей достичь небывалых размеров!<tab>Честно говоря, я никогда не видел такой глупости! — Namono Tayamono

Summon forth your island adenium. Literally a desert rose by another name, and doesn't have much of a scent to brag about.<tab>Sprouted and grown in the South Mandra Kingdom, this adenium lived what he thought was a happy life until he encountered the Peerifool. From the castaway vegetable, he learned about the great wide world beyond the island's bounds, and began to dream of embarking upon grand adventures.<tab>I have oft heard it said that a blossom's beauty can move a man to love and long, but I never truly believed it until I met you two desert roses. - Thancred

Summon forth your dais of Darkness. Will not vanish beneath your feet after a set duration.<tab>A piece of the battlefield created by the Cloud of Darkness, upon which only those recognized by the being may set foot. While it has sent countless foes plummeting into endless void, by triumphing over its maker, you appear to have gained control over it.<tab>A well-maintained airship can mean the difference between life and a horrible, plummetin' death. - Redbill Engineer

Manifest your wings of eternity. Their luminous green hue exudes the determination of a recreated queen.<tab>Found within the virtual domain created by the Meso Terminal, these armor-clad wings are reminiscent of the dread entity that Sphene had become. While their origin is shrouded in mystery, they exude the unwavering determination of a ruler who placed her subjects above all else.<tab>My desire to protect my people transcends all others! - Sphene

Manifest your wings of ruin. Rest assured they won't bring destruction wherever they go.<tab>Calling to mind Valigarmanda, the dread creature dubbed the Skyruin, these magicked wings grant their wearer an aura of irrepressible might. Though they are said to manifest only for those who are worthy, the truth of their nature is shrouded in mystery.<tab>The tales these walls could tell of the Skyruin... - Pameka

Summon forth your shroud of Darkness, a lingering sliver of the Cloud of Darkness's eldritch raiment.<tab>A sliver of the eldritch raiment worn by the Cloud of Darkness. Appearing to be perpetuated by residual aether, it shows no sign of dissipating and allows its wearer to fly freely. Though soft to the touch like the finest wool, the fog that clings to it results in a persistent clamminess.<tab>Darkness shall consume Light! - Igeyorhm

Summon forth your air-wheeler A9. The lights aren't merely for show and actually make it go.<tab>Designed and built in Alexandria, this single-rider flying vehicle uses electrope to convert lightning to wind energy, which it expels to produce levitation and propulsion. While air-wheelers are extensively employed by the military, the A9 is a civilian model and does not come fitted with armaments.<tab>I'm looking for an air-wheeler A9. Have you got any...er...smaller sizes? - Milalla Customer

Summon forth your mountain zu, and make ready to quench your thirst for adventure.<tab>This subspecies of the monstrous zu is known to inhabit the mountainous regions of the Near East. Seeking to tame the ill-tempered bird, Hannish alchemists fed it a specially concocted brew, which had the desired effect while causing the creature to give off a refreshing citrus aroma.<tab>I can't remember the last time I felt so refreshed! - Tataru

Призовите для битвы вашего Бочкотендера. Это саботендер, обладающий огромным телосложением, благодаря чему он и получил свое имя.<tab>Родом из засушливых диких мест Ксак Турала, этот ненормально хорошо сложенный саботендер решил ещё больше отточить свою плоть, встретив себе пару в лице искателя приключений. В рамках жёсткого режима тренировок он к тому же охотно и неустанно носит вас на себе.<tab>Черт возьми! Он всё такой же мускулистый и величественный, каким я его запомнила! — Хамфри

Summon forth your mehwapyarra. As dutiful as it is laid-back.<tab>This fully grown mehwapyarra (“capybara” in certain other parts) was wandering alone in Shaaloani when it was attacked and swallowed whole by the tural vidraal Ttokrrone. Fortunately for the creature, you appeared and put down its devourer before it could be digested, and it now lends you its back out of a sense of duty.<tab>The Fury take these ridiculous flying rodents! - Estinien

Summon forth your monowheel S1, a bold vehicle fit for a champion of the Arcadion.<tab>A prize Ascension Arcadia bestows upon its champions, this unique one-wheeled vehicle employs an advanced stability system that allows it to traverse any and all terrain. Owing to its complex controls, however, it takes considerable practice to become a competent rider.<tab>Without further ado, let us set the wheels in motion! - Lady Luck

Summon forth your punutiy, and delight onlookers to no end with its winsome charm.<tab>Inhabiting the waters of Yok Tural, these gentle giants have been employed by men since olden days to tow boats on the continent's rivers and lakes. This specimen is particularly inquisitive, and having been imbued with the ability to fly, it has further developed a taste for travel.<tab>If the punutiys are happy, then I'm happy too. - Yubli

Summon forth your qeziigural, a winged golem whose name means “gold that flies” in the Mamool Ja tongue.<tab>Encountered in Cenote Ja Ja Gural, this winged stone construct is outfitted with golden adornments whose engravings bespeak Mamool Ja origins. As its bare body appears to hail from an earlier time, however, it is believed to be a Yok Huy relic that was repurposed and decorated.<tab>Don't indulge them with anything but a face of stony indifference. - Papa Gruff

Призовите вашего отважного камуя — благословенного волка, не связанного такими телесными законами, как гравитация или аэродинамика.<tab>Во время путешествия на Дальний Восток торговец Ровена встретила и приютила этого волка, который, получив божественное благословение, может свободно скакать по небу. В той части света, откуда он родом, принято доверять свои подношения собакам, чтобы они отнесли их в храм вместо своих хозяев.<tab>О, как предприимчиво! — Hasdahd

Summon forth your brachiosaur, a rare prehistoric creature sighted in frontier lands.<tab>Belonging to an ancient and enormous species, this juvenile creature was hatched from an egg found in the wilds by a hunter-scholar. As its body burgeoned, so too did its appetite for exploration, and it eventually found in you a worthy master to follow.<tab>Due to unforeseen difficulties, House Haillenarte has been forced to suspend the expeditions to the Diadem. - Aurvael

Summon forth your alpaca. Its foul spit is outweighed by its cuteness and utility. Mostly.<tab>Known as a Pelupelu merchant's best friend, the alpaca has long been raised as livestock in the mountainous regions of Tural. They are prized for their wool, a staple material in traditional textiles, as well as their sure-footedness, which sees them employed as both pack animals and cavalry mounts.<tab>You can take an alpaca to water, but you can't make it drink. - Keshkwa

Summon forth Ullr, a dragon on the hunt for a musical collaboration.<tab>Belonging to Ratatoskr's brood, this dragon was searching for a mortal with whom it could weave songs when it chanced to see you in the middle of a hunt. So impressed was it by your prowess, it chose to accompany you on your travels in hopes of witnessing more heroic feats.<tab>Like our esteemed ancestor, I will fill the skies with beauteous songs! - Ehll Tou

Summon forth your automatoise, a weapon of war developed in Origenics.<tab>A weapon of war developed in Origenics, this giant tortoise has been augmented with a reinforced electrope skeleton and servomotors in order to enhance defense and strength. As the underlying creature is ordinarily mild-mannered, it is infused with the soul of a savage predator to lend it ferocity at the onset of battle.<tab>That strikes me as a rather curious thing to be researching, but to each their own, I suppose! - Knowledgeable Loporrit

Manifest your wings of resolve. Their deep-blue hue exudes the burden of a lost man.<tab>Calling to mind Zoraal Ja, King of Resolve of Alexandria, these magicked wings grant their wearer an aura of undying pride. Though they were discovered near the throne on the summit of Everkeep, the truth of their nature is shrouded in mystery.<tab>When the army fails in its duty, it is the charge of the King of Resolve to clean up its mess. - Zoraal Ja

Summon forth your outrunner, a rotund machine built by the Alexandrians.<tab>A general-purpose machine, the outrunner can perform a wide variety of tasks, from the maintenance of facilities and devices to the elimination of dangerous creatures. Its design incorporates a monitor which displays comical expressions in lieu of a face, that it might be more approachable to the public.<tab>Outrunner guide unit identified. - Mechanical Sentry

Призовите ваш ковчег — двуногую боевую машину, способную трансформироваться в компактный воздушный корабль.<tab>Стремясь разработать усовершенствованный трансформирующийся дирижабль, инженеры Гарлонд Айронворкс обратились к опыту бывшего учёного Иллюминатов. В результате получилась машина, способная в мгновение ока превращаться из двуногого режима в воздушный штурмовой корабль.<tab>Похоже, в вас есть нечто большее, чем кажется на первый взгляд. — Югири

Summon forth your rroneek. As your trusty steed, this creature can look forward to living to a ripe old age.<tab>Found grazing the plains of Xak Tural, this stoutly built beastkin has been prized since ancient times on account of fairly every part of it being a useful resource. Owing to its importance in their lives, many nomadic tribes revere it as their guiding animal, and migrate alongside it with the seasons.<tab>Well, you two look happier than a pair of rroneek in the sun. - Zemoweni

Призовите вашего сноустримера — снеговика, созданного из кристаллов вечного льда. Он гарантированно не растает, пока вы находитесь внутри него.<tab>Полый внутри и поддерживаемый силой вечного льда, этот снеговик, одетый в изысканный фиолетовый цвет, обещает не замёрзнуть даже в самую жаркую погоду. По слухам, он является идеальным спутником для тех, кто хочет разделить свои приключения с другими, а также для тех, кто хочет подбодрить других в их приключениях.<tab>Да, в этих снеговиках есть что-то странное, но... я не могу понять, что именно. — Изина

Summon your oppressor mount, a weapon of war-turned-conveyance of comfort.<tab>Originally an autonomous weapon developed by the Illuminati, this oppressor underwent a conversion to be able to carry a pilot. While the process necessitated the stripping of munitions, what the machina loses in destructive capabilities, it gains in luxury and comfort.<tab>What did you expect you were in for, a luxurious litter ride!? - Sicard

Summon forth your ty'aitya. Though its kind is ordinarily only capable of gliding, no one has apparently told this fellow, who can fly indefinitely.<tab>Its name meaning “little voices at play” in Xbr'aal, this herbivorous beastkin is capable of gliding impressive distances owing to the skin that stretches between its wrists and ankles. Fiercely territorial, it is known to attack even large predators using the bladelike cartilage protruding from the side of its hands.<tab>Have you ever seen a ty'aitya? - Ty'at Roh
